name: Giant Flies Want Your Food!
description:
You're having a nice dinner in your cozy apartment, but the flies from across the street want a bite! Beat your high score by eating delicious plates of food while killing flies with your choice of weapons.

This is a solo developed student game. I developed it in the course of a month to learn how to do VR games in Unity. All the coding and art assets (except the plants) were done by me, inspired by Studio Ghibli IPs.

Expect some bugs as this is a very early build.

To install the Quest 2 version, sideload the .apk through adb or SideQuest. The PCVR version has been tested with an Quest 2 through link mode. If you encounter any problems launching it through other headsets, let me know. Enjoy!
